mapper.select: select DISTINCT * from (select community from cf_equipment order BY community,gmt_create ASC)

SELECT community, to_char(gmt_create,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS date1, SUM(equipment_num) as addEqunum FROM cf_equipment WHERE gmt_create >= to_date(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND gmt_create <= to_date(#{endDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') GROUP BY to_char(gmt_create,'YYYY-MM-DD'),community order BY community,date1 ASC
